name: The Above and The Below
description:
Team Name: Awesome Possums

 Gameplay Instructions:

ASWD/Arrows/Gamepad left stick for movement

Space/W/Up Arrow/Gamepad A to jump

E/Gamepad B to pick up

Enter/Gamepad Y to start

Blue coins change your alignment to The Above.  Red coins change your alignment to The Below. When you die, your current alignment determines whether to go to The Above or The Below.

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission (including Marketplace content):

- City environment models

- Lava texture

- Rock models

- Animal models

- Vehicle models

- Music and sound effects ffrom WeLoveIndies

Content created for this Jam:

- All character models

- Character animations

- Particle effects

- Clouds

- All blueprints

- Various specialized variations of purchased assets
